components.table

Class Table

  • java.lang.Object
    • components.table.Table

  • public class Table
extends java.lang.Object
    The Table class represents a table consisting of a list of Row objects. It includes a TypeChecker for checking data types and a file path for potential file operations.

    This class provides methods to get, set, and manipulate the rows within the table, as well as to manage the file path. 

     
 TypeChecker typeChecker = new TypeChecker();
 Table table = new Table(typeChecker);
 table.addRow(new Row());
 List<Row> rows = table.getRows();
    Since:
    2024-06-24

        public Table(TypeChecker typeChecker0)
